price: (4) If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled.[1044]
arabic: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ
footnotes: [1044]- i.e., they would be compelled to believe.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: in nasha nunazzil ʿalayhim mina al-samāi āyatan faẓallat aʿnāquhum lahā khāḍiʿīna
